parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Feminine Singular

str2: From oikos; properly, residence, but usually an abode; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go in, come in, enter. From eis and erchomai; to enter.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To remain, abide, stay, wait; with acc: I wait for, await. A primary verb; to stay.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
Thence, from that place. From ekei; thence.
